title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Alan Shipnuck on Phil’s LIV Controversy, Flaws, Legacy
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Alan Shipnuck on Phil’s LIV Controversy, Flaws, Legacy
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including if Kyler Murray’s massive new contract proves he made the right decision choosing football over baseball, if Patriots players were brainwashed by the ‘Patriot Way’ during the height of the dynasty, if Georgia overpaid Kirby Smart with his new 10-year contract, why California Governor Gavin Newsom’s outrage over USC and UCLA moving to the B1G is so hypocritical, and why James Harden deserves a lot of credit.

Then, longtime Sports Illustrated golf writer Alan Shipnuck joins Colin to discuss his latest book - Phil: The Rip-Roaring (and Unauthorized!) Biography of Golf's Most Colorful Superstar - and how Phil and Greg Norman decided to join forces to wage war on the PGA with LIV (16:00), why the PGA Tour was so vulnerable to real competition (20:00), if flaws make Phil a more sympathetic figure (31:00), if he needed the LIV money due to gambling losses (34:00),and why Greg Norman is uniquely equipped to lead a challenge to the PGA Tour (45:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
